SEARCH
Module melange.common
Package gbw.melange.common.events.observability

Interface IObservableValue<T,R extends UndeterminedBiConsumer<T>,U>

Type Parameters:
T - Type of value held by this observable
R - Type of on change filters applicable to this observable
U - Type of identifier for each filter.
All Known Subinterfaces:
IFallibleBlockingObservable<T>, IFallibleObservableValue<T>, IPrestineBlockingObservable<T>, IPristineObservableValue<T>
public interface IObservableValue<T,R extends UndeterminedBiConsumer<T>,U>
An Observer pattern employing an Intercepting Filters pattern to handle observers.
Version:
$Id: $Id
Author:
GustavBW

    changeEqualityFunction(EqualityFunction<T> newFunc)

  • Method Details

    • get

      T get()
      Retrieves the current value.
      Returns:
      a T object

    • changeEqualityFunction

      void changeEqualityFunction(EqualityFunction<T> newFunc)
      The filter chain is only run when this function evaluates to false.
      Meaning providing this function with (old, newer) -> true will have it run everytime the value is set.
      Parameters:
      newFunc - a EqualityFunction object

    • onChange

      IFilterChain<R,U> onChange()

      onChange.

      Returns:
      Returns the on change consumers applied to this observable value.
